name: jumpyman: ARENA
description:
! downloads are suspended due to a bug !

! At least one controller is required !

jumpyman: ARENA

The first jumpyman spinoff game, you may be asking "What is jumpyman?" jumpyman is the best game to ever exist and is currently in closed alpha testing, it will be released to the public soon™

in jumpyman: ARENA you will:

Fight against your friends (if you have any) in the most intense fighting game ever made

Press f1 or menu on a controller to view controls while in game

Enjoy the game

Other info:

The blue jumpyman can be controlled with a main controller

The red jumpyman can be controlled with a keyboard or a second controller
